title: In depth code reviewing with VS15
sessionTitle: In depth code reviewing with VS15
eventShortDescription:
​A walk through of how to conduct a thorough code review using the New Visual Studio 15.

With the release of the Visual Studio 13 Beta, we’ve seen a greatly improved code review experience.

Adam will cover:

  • The top things to look out for in VS15
  • The new code review tools and functionality
  • Reviewing a real world project​
eventDescription:

  • The top things to look out for in VS15
  • The new code review tools and functionality
  • Reviewing a real world project​
